title: I refused to type "I Agree"
body:
Can you please post a reason it was not your fault? I dont want to type I agree when after years of play I have never left a game.

I dont agree to being insulted when your game booted me. I never left and my ISP had no issues.

replies.body:
I agree entirely, today  i played with bots and 5 others and was reported or picked for afk when i was present and moving the entire game. The reason i did not involve myself in the game as 2 of the players pinged non stop, not just here and there literally non stop just to annoy the crap out of everyone they might not have young children or other reasons that this might cause an issue. After trying oce for the first time over 3 0r 4 days i also will stay with a 200 ping to NA where the children seem to be a lot less.

Thoughts why not punish those that abuse the ping system surely it cannot be hard but apparently trolls and annoying people ruining others experience is more important i guess GG
just report for negative attitude and state your case in the comments section that's what i would do
